0.text:
Fuji Kiseki se desempeña increíblemente bien<n>en la
NHK Mile Cup.

1.text:
El público está completamente cautivado<n>por su
milagro. La depresión y la ira<n>de la estudiante más
joven comienzan a levantarse<n>también.

1.name: Monólogo
1.text:
Fuji Kiseki wants to inspire people even<n>more. To
do so, she wants to enter the<n>Mile
Championship—the race where the<n>autumn queen
of the mile is decided and<n>where she'll also have
to face<n>senior-year racers.

1.name: Monólogo
1.text:
And so, the next race on our schedule is<n>the Mile
Championship.

1.name: Monólogo
1.text:
Our race through the summer toward the<n>Mile
Championship and the strong<n>opponents waiting
there begins now!
